name: Home Alone Party - LD46
description:
It´s 20:00 Mom and Dad are gone, they´ll return at 02:00. You have six hours to host the best party ever! Chat with your guests to know what they want, put the right music and food in each room and keep the house clean!

This game is the second game made by Dedicave, a small team of young amateur developers from Buenos Aires, Argentina. We really enjoyed taking part in this, our second jam. We´ll appreciate all the feedback. Thanks for playing.

Controls:
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Interact
Bugfixes: v1.0.1 - 04/23/20:
  • Fixed a bug where being within interaction range of a guest that was about to leave the party would crash the game.
